description: At least five people in Gaza were reported dead on Friday after being hit by aid packages airdropped by the United States.
title: U.S. airdropped aid packages kill several people in Gaza

description: An average of 63 women are killed every day, with 37 of them being mothers “who leave their families behind” in the Gaza Strip, the UN agency for Palestinian refugees said, Hurriyet Daily  reported.
title: UNRWA: 63 women killed in Gaza per day

description: TEHRAN- The Islamic Republic of Iran reserves the legitimate and inherent right to take all necessary measures in response to any threat or attack originating from the Israeli regime against its national security and interests, as well as its people, according to Amir Saeed Iravani, Iran’s ambassador and permanent representative to the UN.
title: Iran retains right to counter Israeli aggression: envoy

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Kayhan discussed the statement of the U.S. representative in the International Atomic Energy Agency and said: The U.S. says that Iran should lower the concentration of all its 60% uranium reserves and completely stop the production of 60% uranium enrichment.
title: America broke its JCPOA promise

description: TEHRAN - Head of Iran Aviation Industries Organization (IAIO) Brigadier General Afshin Khajeh Fard said on Thursday that the country's army will establish its indigenous aviation fleet.
title: Iran Army aims to establish fully indigenous aviation fleet

description: TEHRAN – In a notable address during the “International Congress on the Occupation of Palestine in Light of International Law, and the Violation of Human Rights in Gaza," Abbas Ali Kadkhodaei, a member of the Guardian Council's legal committee and the head of the congress, underscored the crucial role of public opinion in preventing Zionists’ crimes in Gaza.
title: Official emphasizes role of public opinion in preventing Israel’s crimes in Gaza

description: TEHRAN- Iran's Judiciary Chief Gholamhossein Mohseni-Ejei has urged Muslim nations to cut off ties with Israel and bring legal action against the occupying force in international tribunals for atrocities against the Palestinian people.
title: Iran judiciary chief calls on Muslim nations to sever ties with Israeli regime

description: TEHRAN - In a recent diplomatic development, the Iranian Ambassador to Azerbaijan has emphasized the need to stop other countries from meddling in the regional issues.
title: Iran’s ambassador to Azerbaijan warns against foreign involvement in Caucasus issues

description: TEHRAN - The purpose of this article is to examine Iran's defensive capabilities at a time when the region is immersed in ongoing tension that could escalate into a large-scale military conflict.
title: Assessing Iran's Military Capabilities

description: TEHRAN – The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) Navy apprehended a vessel transporting smuggled fuel in the Persian Gulf, announced Mojtaba Ghahramani, Chief Justice of Hormozgan province, on Friday.
title: IRGC seizes smuggling vessel in Persian Gulf

description: TEHRAN - On the occasion of March 8 and the International Women's Day, the spokesperson for Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has called out the mass killing of women in Gaza by the Israeli forces.
title: Iran issues condemnation of Israel’s mass killing of Palestinian women on IWD

description: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR) has raised the alarm about the consequences of an anticipated Israeli ground invasion of Rafah.
title: UN: Gaza war may ‘slide deeper into the abyss’

description: TEHRAN- Iran and the European Union engaged in discussions regarding the lifting of sanctions, according to a statement from Iran's Deputy Foreign Minister for Political Affairs.
title: Iran, EU hold talks on sanctions relief

description: TEHRAN – On Friday, Iran’s Persistent Ebrahim Raisi arrived in the southern province of Khuzestan where he has visited several times since taking office in 2021.
title: Iranian President arrives in Khuzestan in continuation of provincial trips

description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal and Persepolis football teams emerged victorious against their opponents in the 2023/24 Iran Persian Professional League (PGPL) on Friday.
title: Esteghlal, Persepolis victorious in PGPL

description: Israeli settlements in the occupied Palestinian territories have expanded by a record amount and risk eliminating any practical possibility of a Palestinian state, the UN human rights chief said on Friday.
title: UN rights chief: Israeli settlements expand by record amount

description: The UN’s expert on torture said on Friday she was investigating allegations of torture and mistreatment of Palestinian detainees in Israel, Reuters reported.
title: UN expert on torture to examine mistreatment of Palestinian detainees

description: Thousands of Yemenis have staged a massive rally in solidarity with Palestinians amidst relentless Israeli ground and aerial attacks on Gaza, calling for more attacks against Israeli-linked vessels in the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden, Press TV reported.
title: Yemenis stage mass demonstration in support of Gaza

description: TEHRAN- President Joe Biden’s focus on Israel’s war on Gaza in his State of the Union address highlighted the pivotal role that the issue will play in the November presidential election in the United States.
title: Pure political propaganda

description: TEHRAN - In a diplomatic encounter, Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi underscored Iran's steadfast dedication to upholding the current borders and geopolitical landscape in the region during discussions with Suren Papikyan, Armenia's Minister of Defense, and his accompanying delegation.
title: Raisi reiterates Iran’s commitment to regional security in meeting with Armenian minister

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “Persian Service: The BBC and British Interests in Iran” written by Annabelle Sreberny and Massoumeh Torfeh has been released in the book market across Iran.
title: Translation of book about British interests in Iran hits bookstores

description:
* Paintings by a group of artists including Vahid Asef, Armin Tohidi, Laleh Dehqan, Leila Zamani, Parviz Kalhor, Masiha Mandegar and Reza Hedayat are on display in an exhibition at Jinus Gallery.
The exhibit will be running until March 13 at the gallery that can be found at 21 Fatemei St., off Vali-e Asr Ave.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN-The cinematheque of the Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art will screen the 1997 Iranian minimalist drama film “Taste of Cherry” written, directed, and produced by Abbas Kiarostami on Sunday.
title: TMoCA cinematheque to show Kiarostami’s “Taste of Cherry”

description: TEHRAN-The late Iranian classical guitarist Lily Afshar will be commemorated at a ceremony at the Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) in Tehran on Sunday.
title: Lily Afshar to be commemorated at IAF

description: TEHRAN-The 19th IAWRT Asian Women’s Film Festival is underway at the India International Center in New Delhi, with a special section dedicated to short films from Iran.
title: 19th IAWRT Asian Women’s Film Festival underway with focus on Iranian short films

description: TEHRAN- During the quarterly meeting of the Council of Governors, Iran’s envoy to the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) highlighted that the resumption of the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA) implementation hinges on specific actions from the United States and the European Troika.
title: JCPOA resumption depends on Western action: Iran

description: For the third time TV BRICS and the international outreach project "Modern Russian" held a teleconference with the Centre of Russian Studies of Jawaharlal Nehru University in New Delhi. The conference was dedicated to Maslenitsa and allowed to find common ground in the Russian holiday of seeing off winter and Indian customs of welcoming spring.
title: Russian, Indian students compare traditions during TV BRICS teleconference

description: The BRICS alliance has become a really powerful organization, Russian President Vladimir Putin said during a talk on Thursday with participants of the World Youth Festival (WYF), the official website of the President of the Russian Federation said.
title: Putin: BRICS is magnet that attracts many countries

description: The Iranian Red Crescent Society is providing relief to people in Sistan-Baluchestan province who have been hit by a devastating flood over the past couple of days.
title: Relief to flood-hit Sistan-Baluchestan

description: TEHRAN – On Thursday, Sistan-Baluchestan’s tourism chief revealed a notable achievement for crafters of the southeastern Iranian province with 65 artworks obtaining national seals of excellence.
title: Sistan-Baluchestan shines bright, achievs​ 65 national seals of excellence

description: TEHRAN – Visiting assessors affiliated with the International Council on Monuments and Sites have expressed their satisfaction with the development of a dossier dedicated to the possible UNESCO registration of Masuleh, an ancient village in northern Iran.
title: ICOMOS evaluators satisfied with Masuleh's path to UNESCO registration

description: TEHRAN - The so-called registration of Iranian cultural icons and elements by other countries has sparked sensitivities and concerns among many Iranians, particularly regarding the appropriation of their cultural treasures.
title: Expert dismisses concerns over intangible cultural heritage registration
Beyond dust and dirt: spring-cleaning and the art of purification

description: TEHRAN – Iran will meet Japan on Saturday in the final match of the 2024 Asian Age Group Championship.
title: Iran to face Japan at 2024 Asian Age Group Championship final

description: TEHRAN – Iranian chess player Mohammadamin Tabatabaei won the international chess festival "Aeroflot Open 2024" on Thursday.
title: Iran’s Tabatabaei wins Aeroflot Open 2024

description: TEHRAN –The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) held on Thursday an international congress on the occupation of Palestine in light of international law, and the violation of human rights in Gaza.
title: IRCS holds event on occupation of Palestine in view of humanitarian law

description: TEHRAN –The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) held on Thursday an international congress on the occupation of Palestine in light of international law, and the violation of human rights in Gaza.
title: IRCS holds event on occupation of Palestinian in view of humanitarian law

description: TEHRAN –Representatives and health authorities of participant countries in the first International Congress on Family Health issued the final statement in 12 key areas.
title: Tehran intl. congress on family health issues final statement

description: TEHRAN – A total of 425 earthquakes have been recorded across the country over the past calendar month that ended on February 19, according to the seismological networks of the Institute of Geophysics of the University of Tehran.
title: Iran shakes with 425 earthquakes in a month

description: BEIJING- Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi, also a member of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, attends a press conference on China's foreign policy and foreign relations on the sidelines of the second session of the 14th National People's Congress (NPC).
title: Chinese FM answers questions raised by world’s journalists

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s deputy oil minister said the country has succeeded in manufacturing 80 percent of oil parts and equipment domestically despite being under sanctions, Mehr news agency reported.
title: Knowledge for manufacturing 80% of oil industry equipment indigenized, says official

description: TEHRAN - The head of the National Iranian Oil Company (NIOC) said on Thursday that Sepehr and Jofeir fields in the southwest of the country will become officially operational soon, Shana reported.
title: Sepehr, Jofeir oil fields to go operational soon: NIOC

description: TEHRAN - Freight transit in Iran’s largest container port, Shahid Rajaee Port, has increased by 89 percent in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023- February 21, 2024) as compared to the previous year’s same period.
title: Freight transit in Shahid Rajaee Port up 89%

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Oil Minister Javad Oji has said the country’s oil and gas industry ranks first among the major gas exporting and producing countries in reducing flare gases.
title: Iran ranks 1st among 70 countries in flare gas recovery: Oji

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian ambassador to Islamabad has said that the country’s capable technical and engineering companies are prepared to contribute to the construction of the Iran-Pakistan gas pipeline (IP) as well as the renovation of Pakistan Steel Mills.
title: Iranian firms ready to contribute to construction of IP pipeline: envoy

description: TEHRAN - Bank Melli Iran has resumed work in Iraq following an order by the Central Bank of Iraq, IRNA reported.
title: Major Iranian bank resumes operation in Iraq
